edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_project.User_Interface

Interface IUserInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphicalUserInterface, TextUserInterface

    public interface IUserInterface
    The UI interface is designed to be used for both a text and graphical UI, these methods are shared between both for swapability while running on the application class.
